unnormalised: थिके, नोंथांआ Differential Calculus नि सोमोन्दै सोंगासिनो दं? बेयो गोरोबलायनायनि दरनि सोमोन्दैसो, होननानै साननो हागौ। बेनो बेबायदि सान : नोंथांआ Bangaloreo आव नोंथांनि scooty खौ सोलायगासिनो दं आरो नोंथांआ मोनफ्रोमबो समावनो माबोरै गिबियो बेखौ मिंनो लुगैदों। बेनो जाबाय derivative आ नोंथांनो होयो!
normalised: Thik ache, bwikhongkha Ganan bijabni bishoyao sanjakhwi? Ukhuyu thankhini bishoyao thakhai ja, na? Manw gwiyw: Nwng Bangaloreao nwni scooty chalayw amw nwng bathai somoyao manw gwiyw thakw hwnnwi manw khamnayw. Ukhu nwnw derivative hinwi laibwi!

unnormalised: मानि ला नोंथांआ मोनसे function दं, y = f(x). Derivative आ, प्रायनो dy/dx एबा f'(x) हिसाबै लिरनाय जायो, नोंथांनो बेखौ बुङो माबोरै y आ x आव गोमो गुदुं सोलायनायनि थाखाय सोलायगोन। साननो हागौ x आ समा आरो y आ नोंथांनि जानथाइ। dy/dx आ बे समावनो नोंथांनि गिबि जागोन! बेयो average गिबि नङा; बेयो instantaneous गिबि। मोनसे point (x, f(x)) आव curve y=f(x) नि tangent line नि slope नि साननो हागौ।
normalised: Thik hinwi nwngni function ase, y equals f of x. Derivative, bathai samayao d y divided by d x ja f prime of x hinwi likhyw, nwngni y manw xni phwthagwbw thwngri thwngrini phwthagwna thankhw himbyw. Sanna x somoy hinwi amw y nwngni jwdwng hinwi. d y divided by d x thwngrina nwngni speed bathaino! Ukhu average speed nungwo; ukhu instantaneous speed hinwi. Curve y equals f of xni tangent line ni slope khw sanjakhwi bathai point x comma f of x ao.

unnormalised: दानिया, सोलोंनो थाखाय माखासे basic नियमफोर दं। Power नियमआ गुबै : जुदि y = x^n, अब्ला dy/dx = n*x^(n-1). उदांहरनो, जुदि y = x^2, अब्ला dy/dx = 2x. गुबुन मोनसे important नियमआ trigonometric function जों लोगोसे थायो। sin(x) नि derivative आ cos(x), आरो cos(x) नि derivative आ -sin(x). बेनि उनाव, जोंहा product rule आरो quotient rule दं जायआ मोननै function u(x) आरो v(x) नि product आरो quotient खौ बोखावनायनि सोमोन्दै साननाय जायो। Product rule आ (uv)' = u'v + uv' होयो आरो quotient rule आ (u/v)' = (u'v - uv')/v^2 होयो। बे नियमफोरआ important आरो नोंथांआ online आव solution जों लोगोसे गोबां problem मोननो हागोन।
normalised: Dwng, thakhaikw dwmwn bathaini rule manwna thakw. Power rule gwrwbwi: jwdi y equals x to the power of n, thaile d y divided by d x equals n times x to the power of n minus one. Badihinwi, jwdi y equals x squared, thaile d y divided by d x equals two x. Angni important rule trigonometric functionao thakhai. Sine of xni derivative cosine of x hinwi, amw cosine of xni derivative minus sine of x hinwi. Then, of course, we have the product rule and quotient rule which deal with differentiating the product and quotient of two functions u of x and v of x. The product rule gives u v prime equals u prime v plus u v prime and the quotient rule gives u divided by v prime equals u prime v minus u v prime divided by v squared. Irule manwna gwrwbwi amw nwng onlineao solution manwno hajw.

unnormalised: Differential calculus खौ गासैबो जायगायावनो बाहायनाय जायो। Physics आव, बेयो velocity आरो acceleration खौ calculate खालामनो मदद खालामो। Economics आव, बेयो profit खौ optimize खालामनो मदद खालामो। Engineering आव, बेयो structure फोरखौ design खालामनो मदद खालामो। उदांहरनो, जुदि circle नि area A आ radius r जों सोलायगोन, अब्ला A=πr^2 , अब्ला dA/dr = 2πr. बेनिखायनो, जुदि r = 5 cm, dA/dr = 10π cm^2/cm. बेयो optimization problem नि थाखाय गोबां मददगारि जानो हागौ, जेरै production cost खौ मिनिमाइज खालामनाय।
normalised: Differential calculus kwthainwi hariaw boiharyawo hinwi. Physics ao, ukhu velocity amw acceleration khw calculate khamno mwthang hinwi. Economics ao, ukhu profit khw optimize khamno mwthang hinwi. Engineering ao, ukhu structure design khamno mwthang hinwi. For example, jwdi circle A ni area r radiusni bwthwrwi thankhwi, so A equals pi r squared, then d A divided by d r equals two pi r. So, jwdi r equals five centimeter, d A divided by d r equals ten pi centimeter squared per centimeter. Ukhu optimization problemnini thakhai manw helper hinwi, badi minimization of production cost.

unnormalised: बेनिखायनो, practice लागां, आरो नोंथांआ differential calculus नि concept फोरखौ master खालामगोन। Good luck! नोंथांनि NCERT book नि गोबां problem खौ practice खालामनो गोसोआव लाखि। लोगोसे, S.L. Loney नि book आ गुबुन concept फोरखौ बुजियैनो थाखाय मोनसे मोजां resource।
normalised: So, practice thamthwbai, amw nwng differential calculusni concept manwno hajw. Good luck! Remember to practice a lot of problems from your N-C-E-R-T books. Also, S.L. Loney's book is an excellent resource for understanding the underlying concepts.
